description: green, red, blue, grey and orange sailboats in foreground; tan buildings in background
provenance: Sale, 2001, Sussex, England, to Campbell; (Michael Campbell, Tunbridge Wells, Kent, England; 2001-2017; sold to Kinney); Marla J. Kinney, Minneapolis
signed: LLC in pencil: \"The Harbour - Brittany\" | LRC in pencil: Kenneth Broad
text: The artist and architect Kenneth Broad was drawn to scenes of everyday life, which he sketched while perched on a camp stool. He exhibited with the Arts and Crafts Exhibition Society in London. That group, founded in 1887, gave the Arts and Crafts movement its name.
title: The Harbour - Brittany
